name: Flow Through Colors!
description:
Dance in a party at midnight with your friends! Make your emotions flow and make your body feel your favourite songs.

Two types of movement:

- Normal movement for the pub traversing.

- Grid Movement while dancing. Tap each time in the WASD to go to that direction.

Interact with small objects with the space bar.

The dance minigame consists on concatenating the most possible number of tiles with the same color as the floor. Remember to end in the same color tile or the concatenation will fail. You can exit the dance anytime you want with the escape key.

There is a secret final, will you be able to find it?

Enjoy the dance!

Game made for the UMA Videogames Master's Degree to try to convey emotions with simple shapes.
